title: Project-Based Learning Course for Cultivating Digital Literacy in Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and understanding of secondary education curricula
context.additional_context: Project execution based on learnersâ€™ BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments and collaborative tools.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can produce 10-minute social studies lesson materials by applying principles of instructional design for digital literacy (e.g., PPT structuring techniques).
Preservice teachers can design digital textbooks integrating three core concepts of social studies units using multimedia tools (videos, interactive elements, etc.).
Preservice teachers can record a 5-minute micro-lecture in a VR simulation environment and derive three improvement strategies through learner engagement analysis.

resources: PPT creation templates and sample resources
Multimedia production software (Canva, Adobe Spark, etc.)
VR lecture recording and analytics platform

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
